attributes.action: Let Lee James have an Appeal
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for Lee James Aka Peacock to get an appeal he deserves as now the truth has come to light which proves Lee was telling the truth.
In December 2008 Lee James was given a life sentence with a minimum 26 years for the murder and wounding of two men, one of which was the murder of Lee Rigby in Woolwich..Michael Adebowale...yes that one.
Lee has always said that these people where selling drugs and was recruiting young people into become jidhadist to hit the UK but No one believed him.
As history has proven Lee was right and telling the truth!
All we ask is for Lee to get an appeal and could you take 5 minutes to sign this petition.
Thank you
Lee's Family

rejection.details: The MOJ cannot publish this case as it relates to a specific court case rather than government policy.
